title: Your device is corrupt error.
content:
I have this "your device is corrupt" error today after I restart my phone. (It happen after the phone hang and forced restart it). I have tried factory, sideload the device the full OTA rom(feb) but nth works.

Now it happen everytime i restart the phone, but I am still able to proceed and phone functions seem fine.

It's annoying and is there anyway I can resolve this ?
